product information:
Have a wonderful viewing experience on the black and silver SyncMaster 204B monitor that features a wider viewing angle of 160 degrees. This Samsung LCD monitor features a contrast ratio of 800:1 for crisp and vibrant images. The MagicColor feature of this 20-inch monitor delivers improved hue and saturation of colors. The 8ms MagicSpeed of the SyncMaster 204B monitor delivers fast moving action scenes clearly without judder. The dual interface of this Samsung LCD monitor processes both analog and digital video signals for an optimal viewing experience. The MagicBright feature of this 20-inch monitor offers four different modes namely text, internet, entertain and custom with its own pre-configured brightness value. Owing to the MagicTune feature, the SyncMaster 204B monitor delivers an enhanced OSD GUI interface that makes it easier for you to understand and operate.
